thread.title: ‘We need to close our borders now’
thread.title_full: ‘We need to close our borders now’

title: ‘We need to close our borders now’
text:
London writer rails against British emigration in viral post LAUREN McMAH news.com.au London writer rails against British emigration in viral post LAUREN McMAH news.com.au London man Emlyn Pearce is sick of British emigrants. Not immigrants: emigrants. 
A LONDON-based writer has unleashed a fiery rant about migration on social media and the internet is going wild over it. 
As the world continues to debate the current refugee crisis in Europe, British man Emlyn Pearce, who is originally from Johannesburg, South Africa, decided to share his own views in an epic Facebook rant that has been shared more than 22,500 times and is trending on Twitter. 
Rather than complain about refugees and immigrants in the UK and elsewhere, Pearce hilariously rails against British emigration to other parts of the world. Other Stories
